Player History
Signed as a free agent by San Diego on 4/3/1985 to a 1-year deal worth $1,368,000 per year...
Had first career hit on 4/3/1985, off Bert Blyleven (STL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/5/1985, off Dennis Martinez (STL)...
2/2/1986: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,807,143 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/10/1986, hitting .350 with 3 HR, 3 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/18/1986, hitting .579 with 2 HR, 4 RBI...
Won Gold Glove Award at First Base in 1986...
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 2/16/1987 to a 5-year deal worth $6,420,420 per year...
Drove in 6 runs against Boston on 9/24/1987...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/12/1990, hitting .550 with 2 HR, 4 RBI...
Won Gold Glove Award at First Base in 1990...
10/14/1991: Signed a contract extension with Texas, $2,960,000 per year, for 2 years.
